name: Bats (DaFloppyPursuit)
description:
Controls

Move left and right with the 'a' and 'd' keys and jump with the 'w' key.

Hold left mouse button to fire at the bats.

Try to get the best score and survive the longest time.

Please comment any issues and feedback what you did and didn't like!

Made with python and pygame, not a very ambitious project on purpose. Moving to c++ but might come back to it.
